name: Institute of Public Administration
goal: The IPA is Ireland's premier public sector management development agency. Founded in 1957 it seeks to promote the study and improvement of standards of public administration and management. In addition to research and publications, the Institute offers primary degree, diploma and certificate programmes as well as postgraduate programmes.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, Regional Policy
euInitiatives: Economic governance, constitutional developments, enlargement, future of the EU, Brexit negotiations, local government development
